module.name: hipay
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system

module.additional_description: More than 158,000 merchants use Skrill – here’s why: No set up or monthly fees Process credit and debit card payments Up to 100 additional local payment options Highest security standards (PCI DSS level 1) Anti-fraud checks included Free set up within 72 hours

The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.description_full: Sell your products to more than 100 million buyers in Europe thanks to our cloud-based platform. Launch in new markets, reach more customers and grow your revenue by 30% year on year! Our marketplaces expert team, complemented by our powerful software will provide you with the perfect combination to meet online success. DISCOVER NETEVEN NOW!
module.additional_description: Get the edge over your competitors and save time, money and resources! Sell your products on the world’s leading online marketplaces via one single platform. Using Neteven’s proprietary cloud-based software and bespoke services you can:   gain maximum exposure for your catalogue grow your business and go global optimise your e-commerce distribution benefit from a personalized module to centralise and simply manage your marketplace orders from your Prestashop solution Neteven integrate you with the largest number of leading marketplaces worldwide:   FRANCE: eBay.fr, Amazon.fr, Fnac.com, Cdiscount.com, LaRedoute.fr, Pixmania.com, PriceMinister.fr, RueDuCommerce.com, BrandAlley.fr, Zalando.fr, Atosho.com, Galeries-lafayette.fr, Spartoo.fr UK: eBay.co.uk, Amazon.co.uk, Pixmania.co.uk, Play.com, Zalando.co.uk, Spartoo.co.uk, Atosho.com GERMANY: eBay.de, Amazon.de, Pixmania.de, Otto.de, Zalando.de, Rakuten.de ITALY: eBay.it, Amazon.it, Zalando.it, Pixmania.it, Spartoo.it, Privalia.it SPAIN: eBay.es, Amazon.es, Fnac.es, Pixmania.es, Spartoo.es, Rakuten.es, Privalia.es HOLLAND: eBay.nl, Amazon.nl, Zalando.nl, Pixmania.nl BELGIUM: eBay.be, Amazon.be, Zalando.be, Pixmania.be AUSTRIA: eBay.at, Amazon.at, Zalando.at SWITZERLAND: eBay.ch Amazon.ch, Zalando.ch NORWAY: eBay.no, Amazon.no, Atsoho.no DENMARK: eBay.dk, Amazon.dk, Atsoho.dk USA - CANADA: eBay.com, Amazon.com

With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.   Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. module.name: prediggo
module.description: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter
module.description_full: Through this module, Prediggo is offering you the possibility to increase your conversion rate by 30%. How? Sell Smarter. ï»¿   Enjoy 1-month free trial now with the promo code FREEMERCH14 !
module.additional_description: Both solutions require a fee. Do not hesitate to contact us for a quotation.   High performance have been proven by A/B testingOur patented semantic technology represents the next generation in e-merchandising. It powers the selling strategies that increase sales by 30% through increased conversion and average order value.   Prediggo is a flexible solution that is easy-to-useOur intuitive back-office makes it easy to automate and optimise the most complex merchandising !   Only a few days integration neededPrediggo is the only “complete” solution that does not require integration with your ERP, Cookies or Javascript. Our solutions work on a data export, so they integrate in days, not weeks.    A superior serviceSince we started in 2008, customer service has been one of our core values. So it is no wonder that our customer's have reported a 100% satisfaction rate in our 2012 and 2013 surveys!

module.description_full: Website and product reviews from your clients can increase your sales ! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your adwords stars thanks to our partnership with Google.   Try now ! 15 days for free !
module.additional_description: Collect and publish reviews from your clients with the trusted third-party Verified Reviews.    Why choose us ?      With Verified Reviews, you can now enjoy :    - A full tailor-made solution    - Packages including the collect of both website and product reviews    - Unbeatable prices-The best feedback rate of the market    - Great facebook applications - A certificate of authenticity    - Stars in Adwords thanks to our partnership with Google    - An offer WITHOUT OBLIGATION    Try now ! 15 days for free !
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue
module.description_full: Youstice is a revolutionary way for companies to handle complaints. Companies and customers communicate via an application that engages with a friendly structured dialogue. The claim is resolved in a couple of clicks, time is saved and customer’s loyalty increased.
module.additional_description: Youstice is a new-generation multilingual online tool, delivering fast and fair solutions to customer complaints all over the world. It helps companies seamlessly communicate and handle claims - both within countries and cross-border.   Through Youstice, in just a couple of clicks, both sides can communicate and negotiate directly, getting issues resolved within minutes. The process is standardized, automated and sophisticated, as it provides options for a constructive dialogue between the consumer and retailer. If no agreement can be reached, Youstice offers the option to have the complaint reviewed by a neutral third-party professional, by mutual agreement, for a quick and fair decision.   By resolving complaints rapidly and fairly retailers become trusted sellers, gain loyal customers, prevent negative feedback and make clients more engaged.   Watch our video and visit our website for more information.   Benefits Connect with your customers and increase their loyalty – thanks to a personalized approach to customer complaints You save time- solving a complaint takes just a couple of clicks You minimize negative reviews and prevent customers from posting future ones by resolving their complaints quickly and efficiently You get help with international expansion – you will get an access to our ecosystem of interconnected online markets, consumer organizations, trustmarks and ODR (Online Dispute Resolution) providers

module.name: olark
module.description: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers
module.description_full: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers. Give your customers the answers they need immediately and gain powerful insights about what they want for relationships that last.   Sign up now!

Targeted Chat rules to interact only with the customers that perform certain actions Customize the design to match your website color pallette Advanced Reporting for awesome operator insights Advanced JavaScript API for deeper integrations
module.author: Prestashop

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: Easymarketing – The sales turbo with immediate effect. Web shop analysis, campaign setup and advertisement optimisation for content customers
module.description_full: Easymarketing – The sales turbo with immediate effect. Web shop analysis, campaign setup and advertisement optimisation for content customers. Easymarketing automatises your advertising campaigns on Google, Google Shopping and Facebook. Maximum performance through fully automated marketing. Sign up now!
module.additional_description: Easymarketing automatises your advertising campaigns on Google, Google Shopping and Facebook. With the help of artificial intelligence, a highly efficient robot (bot), your web shop Ìs complete product range is read and the suitable keywords or keyword combinations are filtered out in a short time. The smart technology behind the robot facilitates the creation of about 5,000 different advertisements per web shop, continuously optimising the cost per click. The bot is able to measure the success of products and keywords within the framework of the displayed campaigns. In this way, keywords can be regularly checked for relevance and added value and can be eliminated if necessary, saving those keywords which convert optimally. The campaigns are continually optimised according to times of day, days of the week as well as geographic circumstances, therefore becoming more and more profitable over time. Once the robot has found the perfect marketing mix, merchants achieve a maximum sales increase. Google is convinced as well.  Easymarketing is an exclusive Google SME Partner in Germany.
module.author: Prestashop
